description: Allows the user to transform parts of their body into scissors and cut solid objects as if they were paper, making the user a Scissors Human.

abilityReveals.description: Inazuma cuts through solid stone structures like staircases, manipulating the cut sections.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to cut the staircase between Level 3 and Level 2 to slow Magellan's pursuit.

abilityReveals.description: A technique using the Choki Choki no Mi to create barriers or obstacles.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used as part of the defensive strategy against Magellan.

strengths.strength: Can cut through any solid material regardless of durability
strengths.description: Demonstrated cutting through stone staircases effortlessly.

description: Allows the user to produce and control various types of poison, making the user a Poison Human.

abilityReveals.description: Magellan completely engulfs himself in liquid poison and travels within one of his Hydra's necks to quickly move between locations.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to bypass the destroyed staircase and travel from Level 3 to Level 2 instantly.

strengths.strength: Provides extreme mobility through poison constructs
strengths.description: Venom Road allows rapid traversal through the prison levels.

description: Allows the user to create and control hormones, making the user a Hormone Human.
